A dashing horse once founded a church. Along came a philosophical cat who thought "A guru like me needs a messiah like this for my sects."
"For the best messiahs are spiritual leaders," thought the philosophical cat. So this guru decided to start a sect about the dashing horse.

🐺👋🐗💢 (or: 🐗 was whipped by 🐺) But David the 🐺 took a whip to Madonna the 🐗's back.
